chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
P: list (mm_instr (pos n))
v: Vector.t nat n

Goal:
mm_no_self_loops (1, P) -> (1, P) /MM/ (1, v) ↓ <-> encode_mm_instr 1 P /F/ ps 1 * exp 0 v ↓

Premises:
exp = fix exp (n i : nat) (v : vec nat n) {struct v} : nat := match v with | vec_nil => 1 | Vector.cons _ x n0 v0 => qs i ^ x * exp n0 (S i) v0 end : forall n : nat, nat -> vec nat n -> nat Arguments exp {n}%nat_scope _%nat_scope
Inductive mm_instr (X : Set) : Set := mm_inc : X -> mm_instr X | mm_dec : X -> nat -> mm_instr X Arguments mm_instr _%type_scope Arguments mm_inc [X]%type_scope Arguments mm_dec [X]%type_scope _ _%nat_scope
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, pos (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, pos n -> pos (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
encode_mm_instr : forall m : nat, nat -> list (mm_instr (pos m)) -> list (nat * nat)
ps = {| str := fun n : nat => nthprime (2 * n); str_inj := fun (n m : nat) (H : nthprime (2 * n) = nthprime (2 * m)) => let H0 : 2 * n = 2 * m := nthprime_inj (2 * n) (2 * m) H in (fun lemma : n = m <-> BinInt.Z.of_nat n = BinInt.Z.of_nat m => Morphisms.iff_flip_impl_subrelation (n = m) (BinInt.Z.of_nat n = BinInt.Z.of_nat m) lemma) (ZifyClasses.mkrel nat BinNums.Z eq BinInt.Z.of_nat eq (fun x y : nat => iff_sym (Znat.Nat2Z.inj_iff x y)) n (BinInt.Z.of_nat n) eq_refl m (BinInt.Z.of_nat m) eq
Notation pos := Fin.t
mm_no_self_loops : forall n : nat, nat * list (mm_instr (pos n)) -> Prop
Module Vector := Struct Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, t A n -> t A (S n) Definition t_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, vec A n -> Type), P 0 vec_nil -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t -> P (S n) (h ## t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t. Definition t_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, vec A n -> Prop), P 0 vec_nil -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t -> P (S n) (h ## t)) -> forall (
Module MM := Struct Inductive mm_instr (X : Set) : Set := mm_inc : X -> mm_instr X | mm_dec : X -> nat -> mm_instr X Definition mm_instr_rect : forall (X : Set) (P : mm_instr X -> Type), (forall x : X, P (INCₐ x)) -> (forall (x : X) (n : nat), P (DECₐ x n)) -> forall m : mm_instr X, P m. Definition mm_instr_ind : forall (X : Set) (P : mm_instr X -> Prop), (forall x : X, P (INCₐ x)) -> (forall (x : X) (n : nat), P (DECₐ x n)) -> forall m : mm_instr X, P m. Definition mm_instr_rec : forall (X : Set) (P : mm_instr X -> Set), (forall x : X
ZMicromega.F = fun (acc : BinNums.positive) (f : EnvRing.Pol BinNums.Z * RingMicromega.Op1) => BinPos.Pos.max acc (ZMicromega.max_var BinNums.xH (fst f)) : BinNums.positive -> EnvRing.Pol BinNums.Z * RingMicromega.Op1 -> BinNums.positive Arguments ZMicromega.F _%positive_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
mm_remove_self_loops : forall (n : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos n))), {Q : list (mm_instr (pos (S n))) | mm_no_self_loops (1, Q) /\ (forall (i : nat) (x : pos (S n)) (j : nat), (i, [DECₐ x j]) <sc (1, Q) -> j < 1 + length Q) /\ (forall v : vec nat n, (1, P) /MM/ (1, v) ↓ <-> (1, Q) /MM/ (1, 0 ## v) ↓)}
mm_self_loop_no_term_1 : forall (n : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (s : nat * vec nat n) (v : vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x i]) <sc (1, P) -> s = (i, v) -> v#>x = 0 -> ~ (1, P) /MM/ s ↓
mm_self_loop_no_term_2 : forall (n : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (s : nat * vec nat n) (v : vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x (1 + i); DECₐ x i]) <sc (1, P) -> s = (i, v) \/ s = (1 + i, v) -> v#>x = 0 -> ~ (1, P) /MM/ s ↓
FRACTRAN_ALT_HALTING = fun H : FRACTRAN_ALT_PROBLEM => let (l, s) := H in let (n, v) := s in l /F/ ps 1 * exp 1 v ↓ : FRACTRAN_ALT_PROBLEM -> Prop
MM_HALTING = fun P : MM_PROBLEM => let (n, s) := P in let (P0, v) := s in (1, P0) /MM/ (1, v) ↓ : MM_PROBLEM -> Prop
one_step_forward : forall (m i : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos m))) (i1 : nat) (v1 : vec nat m) (i2 : nat) (v2 : vec nat m), mm_no_self_loops (i, P) -> (i, P) /MM/ (i1, v1) → (i2, v2) -> encode_mm_instr i P /F/ encode_state (i1, v1) → encode_state (i2, v2)
MMA_HALTING = fun (n : nat) (P : MMA_PROBLEM n) => sss_terminates (mma_sss (n:=n)) (1, fst P) (1, snd P) : forall n : nat, MMA_PROBLEM n -> Prop Arguments MMA_HALTING {n}%nat_scope
MMA_HALTS_ON_ZERO = fun (n : nat) (P : MMA_PROBLEM n) => sss_output (mma_sss (n:=n)) (1, fst P) (1, snd P) (0, vec_zero) : forall n : nat, MMA_PROBLEM n -> Prop Arguments MMA_HALTS_ON_ZERO {n}%nat_scope
steps_forward : forall (m i : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos m))) (i1 : nat) (v1 : vec nat m) (i2 : nat) (v2 : vec nat m) (k : nat), mm_no_self_loops (i, P) -> (i, P) /MM/ (i1, v1) -[ k ] -> (i2, v2) -> encode_mm_instr i P /F/ encode_state (i1, v1) -[ k ] -> encode_state (i2, v2)
one_step_backward : forall (m i : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos m))) (i1 : nat) (v1 : vec nat m) (st : nat), mm_no_self_loops (i, P) -> encode_mm_instr i P /F/ encode_state (i1, v1) → st -> exists (i2 : nat) (v2 : vec nat m), st = encode_state (i2, v2) /\ (i, P) /MM/ (i1, v1) → (i2, v2)
steps_backward : forall (m i : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos m))) (i1 : nat) (v1 : vec nat m) (k st : nat), mm_no_self_loops (i, P) -> encode_mm_instr i P /F/ encode_state (i1, v1) -[ k ] -> st -> exists (i2 : nat) (v2 : vec nat m), (i, P) /MM/ (i1, v1) -[ k ] -> (i2, v2) /\ st = encode_state (i2, v2)
mm_no_self_loops_app : forall (n i : nat) (P Q : list (mm_instr (pos n))), mm_no_self_loops (i, P) -> mm_no_self_loops (length P + i, Q) -> mm_no_self_loops (i, P ++ Q)
MM_HALTS_ON_ZERO = fun P : MM_PROBLEM => let (n, s) := P in let (P0, v) := s in sss_output (mm_sss (n:=n)) (1, P0) (1, v) (0, vec_zero) : MM_PROBLEM -> Prop
skip_steps : forall (m k : nat) (l r : list (mm_instr (pos m))) (k' : nat) (v v' : vec nat m), mm_no_self_loops (k, l ++ r) -> encode_mm_instr (k + length l) r /F/ encode_state (k + length l, v) → encode_state (k', v') -> encode_mm_instr k (l ++ r) /F/ encode_state (k + length l, v) → encode_state (k', v')

ps_1 = nthprime_2 : ps 1 = 5
mm_steps_INC_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [INCₐ x]) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> P /MM/ (i, v) -[ k ] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P /MM/ (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) -[ k' ] -> st
not_ps_1 : forall n : nat, ps n <> 1
mm_steps_DEC_1_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x p]) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> v#>x = S u -> P /MM/ (i, v) -[ k ] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P /MM/ (1 + i, v[u/x]) -[ k' ] -> st
encode_mm_instr_in_inv : forall (n i : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos n))) (el : list (nat * nat)) (c : nat * nat) (er : list (nat * nat)), encode_mm_instr i P = el ++ c :: er -> exists (l : list (mm_instr (pos n))) (rho : mm_instr (pos n)) (r : list (mm_instr (pos n))), P = l ++ rho :: r /\ In c (encode_one_instr (length l + i) rho)
exp_nil : forall i : nat, exp i vec_nil = 1
encode_state = fun (n : nat) (c : nat * vec nat n) => ps (fst c) * exp 0 (snd c) : forall n : nat, nat * vec nat n -> nat Arguments encode_state {n}%nat_scope
mm_progress_DEC_0 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x k]) <sc P -> v#>x = 0 -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (k, v) st -> sss_progress (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st
mm_compute_DEC_0 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x k]) <sc P -> v#>x = 0 -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (k, v) st -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st
exp_zero : forall n i : nat, exp i vec_zero = 1
exp_cons : forall (n i x : nat) (v : vec nat n), exp i (x ## v) = qs i ^ x * exp (S i) v
fractran_step_inv : forall (P : list (nat * nat)) (x y : nat), P /F/ x → y -> exists (l : list (nat * nat)) (p q : nat) (r : list (nat * nat)), P = l ++ (p, q) :: r /\ (forall u v : nat, In (u, v) l -> ~ divides v (u * x)) /\ q * y = p * x
exp_app : forall (n m i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (w : vec nat m), exp i (vec_app v w) = exp i v * exp (n + i) w

sss_steps_1 : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (st1 st2 : nat * data), sss_step one_step P st1 st2 -> sss_steps one_step P 1 st1 st2
encode_mm_instr_app : forall (m i : nat) (l r : list (mm_instr (pos m))), encode_mm_instr i (l ++ r) = encode_mm_instr i l ++ encode_mm_instr (length l + i) r
divides_1_inv : forall p : nat, divides p 1 -> p = 1
natr_ring_lemma1 : forall (n : nat) (l : list nat) (lpe : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr BinNums.N * Ring_polynom.PExpr BinNums.N)) (pe1 pe2 : Ring_polynom.PExpr BinNums.N), Ring_polynom.interp_PElist 0 1 Init.Nat.add Init.Nat.mul (SRsub Init.Nat.add) (SRopp (R:=nat)) eq BinNat.N.to_nat id_phi_N (pow_N 1 Init.Nat.mul) l lpe -> (let lmp := Ring_polynom.mk_monpol_list BinNums.N0 (BinNums.Npos BinNums.xH) BinNat.N.add BinNat.N.mul BinNat.N.add (fun x : BinNums.N => x) BinNat.N.eqb BinNat.N.div_eucl lpe in Ring_polynom.Peq BinNat.N.eqb (Ring_polynom.norm_subst BinNums.N0 (BinNums.Npos BinNums.xH...
mm_progress_INC : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [INCₐ x]) <sc P -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) st -> sss_progress (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st
mm_compute_INC : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [INCₐ x]) <sc P -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) st -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st
Init.Nat.pow = fix pow (n m : nat) {struct m} : nat := match m with | 0 => 1 | S m0 => n * pow n m0 end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.pow (_ _)%nat_scope
mm_term_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (se : nat * vec nat n) (Q : nat * vec nat n -> Prop), (out_code (fst se) P -> Q se) -> (forall (i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), (i, [ρ]) <sc P -> ρ // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> sss_output (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (j, w) se -> Q (j, w) -> Q (i, v)) -> forall s : nat * vec nat n, sss_output (mm_sss (n:=n)) P s se -> Q s
vec_prod_div : forall (m : nat) (v : vec nat m) (u0 : nat) (p : pos m) (i : nat), v#>p = S u0 -> qs (p + i) * exp i (v[u0/p]) = exp i v
mm_special_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (se : nat * vec nat n) (Q : nat * vec nat n -> Prop), Q se -> (forall (i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), (i, [ρ]) <sc P -> ρ // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (j, w) se -> Q (j, w) -> Q (i, v)) -> forall s : nat * vec nat n, sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P s se -> Q s
mm_compute_DEC_S : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x k]) <sc P -> v#>x = S u -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (1 + i, v[u/x]) st -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st

```coq
intros n P v H. unfold mm_no_self_loops, encode_mm_instr, encode_state, exp.
intros H1.
split.
- intros [H2 H3].
  unfold FRACTRAN_ALT_HALTING.
  rewrite Nat.mul_comm.
  unfold ps.
  rewrite ps_1.
  rewrite exp_nil.
  rewrite Nat.pow_1_r.
  apply H1.
  assumption.
- intros H2.
  split.
  + exists 1%nat.
    split.
    * apply Nat.lt_0_succ.
    * apply H2.
  + intros st H3.
    destruct st as [i w].
    exists i, w.
    split.
    * apply H3.
    * apply H1.
Qed.
```

original: intros n P v H. unfold mm_no_self_loops, encode_mm_instr, encode_state, exp. intros H1. split. - intros [H2 H3]. unfold FRACTRAN_ALT_HALTING. rewrite Nat.mul_comm. unfold ps. rewrite ps_1. rewrite exp_nil. rewrite Nat.pow_1_r. apply H1. auto. - intros H2. split. + exists 1%nat. split. * apply Nat.lt_0_succ. * apply H2. + intros st H3. destruct st as [i w]. exists i, w. split. * apply H3. * apply H1.
